title: Build your own budget with Oreo cookies and send it to Congress
body: <p>I thought that <a href="http://www.truemajorityaction.org/oreos" title="Oreos and The Federal Budget">this was kinda neat</a>. You can watch the one on the left to see how the budget of Oreos works, then you can go back and use the one on the right to build your own budget and it will send it to the appropriate members of congress for your area.  It is our money that they get, so they should know how we'd like them to spend it.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2005-02-09
